en: :information_source: The wishing well party has reached the maximum size!
The magic wishing well's effects will be maximized!
The wishing well will not respond to you unless you approach it in a channel and not DM.
You sure wish you had more loot.
We all wish we had more time.
The wishing well glows with magic. Time is up!
es: La magia del pozo de los deseos brilla. Se termino el tiempo!

en: Wow, your wish came true. You had
Use `fruit list` to get started with a loot fruit garden that you can tend to and collect rewards from.
es: Use `fruit list` para comenzar con un jardín de frutas botín del que puede atender y recoger recompensas.

en: You have no stored loot fruit to be redeemed!
You can do `fruit list` to see your fruit status.
To move ripe fruit from your garden to your storage, use the `fruit keep` command.

You must specify _exactly_ 3 fruits from your stored fruit list to redeem.
All fruits should be of the same color or of the same flavor.
Specify fruits by numbers (use `fruit list` to see a list) and separate them with spaces.
Example: `fruit redeem 1 3 4`
seconds to guess by typing `!s <your guess>`.
zh-Hans: 秒。要猜单词，请输入`!s <猜测>。`
